scripts.private::lint.black: if [[ $PYLINTRC != '.pylintrc' ]]; then black dash tests --exclude metadata_test.py --check; fi
scripts.private::test.setup-nested: cd \@plotly/dash-generator-test-component-nested && npm ci && npm run build && pip install -e .
scripts.private::test.setup-standard: cd \@plotly/dash-generator-test-component-standard && npm ci && npm run build && pip install -e .
scripts.private::test.setup-r-standard: cd dash-main/\@plotly/dash-generator-test-component-standard && npm ci && npm run build && sudo R CMD INSTALL . && cd ../../..
scripts.private::test.setup-r-nested: cd dash-main/\@plotly/dash-generator-test-component-nested && npm ci && npm run build && sudo R CMD INSTALL . && cd ../../..
scripts.private::test.integration-dash: TESTFILES=$(circleci tests glob "tests/integration/**/test_*.py" | circleci tests split --split-by=timings) && pytest --headless --nopercyfinalize --junitxml=test-reports/junit_intg.xml ${TESTFILES}
